title: SOL 1pk 4 In A Row Game, Four Quad Connect Mini Pocket Travel Strategy Flip Board Game, Portable Design for Kids, Children, or Adults, Classic Educational Fun Play with Family and Friends
features: 4 In A Row Game | Family Fun Kids Board Games & Travel Games for Kids & Adults | Board Games Kids Travel Games for Kids Travel Board Games | Children's Board Games | Four In A Row Game + SOL Sticker

Play Anywhere & Everywhere - This portable Connect 4 game can go with you while you are travelling. You can play with it at school, at the office during break time, or just at home with your loved ones, for a quick challenging yet fun board game. Lightweight and durable plastic board for quick set up.

For Happy & Fun Family Time - Play our 4 in a row board game with friends and loved ones and create memories to look back on in the future. Enjoy the time you spend with together, and get competitive.

Get It Out Christmas After Christmas - Made from durable plastic for year after year of family fun and competition. Ideal connect 4 game for kids & adults. Board games for 6+ year olds, Board Games for 8+ year olds & Travel games for kids ages 4-8.
Includes - (1) Mini Connect 4 Set with Red and Yellow Chips & 1x Free SOL Sticker is also included.
description: Product Description Previous page Next page 1 Fun Game 2 Share the Love Dive into our Toys & Games 4 In A Row Game Add To Basket 48pk Mini Tumbling Tower Add To Basket 96pk Mini Tumbling Tower Add To Basket Travel Snakes And Ladders Buying Options 1pk Ankle Skip Ball Buying Options 28pk Dominoes Set Buying Options 1pk Stretchy Lizard Toy Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.0 out of 5 stars 554 3.6 out of 5 stars 607 3.2 out of 5 stars 29 3.7 out of 5 stars 71 3.7 out of 5 stars 574 — 4.3 out of 5 stars 43 Price £5.99 £ 5 . 99 £4.99 £ 4 . 99 £6.99 £ 6 . 99 — — — £5.99 £ 5 . 99 Quantity 1pk 48pk 96pk 1pk 1pk 28pcs 1pk Suitable for Age 5+ years 3+ years 3+ years 5+ years 5+ years 3+ years 5+ years Unleash Joy ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Playtime Unlimited ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Journey into Fun ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ What ages is the 4 In A Row game suitable for? The 4 In A Row game is ideal for children aged 5 and up, as well as adults. It's perfect for family fun and travel. How portable is this Connect 4 game? This game is lightweight and made of durable plastic, making it easy to carry and set up anywhere, from school to home or during travel. What does the 4 In A Row game set include? The set includes a detachable blue game board and 42 counters—21 red and 21 yellow. A free SOL sticker is also included. Can this game be used year after year? Yes, the game is made from durable plastic, ensuring it can be enjoyed Christmas after Christmas for long-lasting family fun. How easy is it to set up and store the game? The game board is easy to set up and can be folded down flat for convenient storage and portability, making it perfect for travel.
